text: 12:28 Aposel 13:1; Rom 12:6; Efesus 2:20; 4:11-12Egha God siosɨn ingangarim damuasa, faragha aposelbav sefe, egha aposelbar gɨn, a uan akamɨn otivir akabar gun mɨgeir gumazamizibav sefe, egha men gɨn, God ifongezir arazibar igharaz darazir sure gamir gumazamizibav sefe. Egha uaghan mirakelbagh amir gumazamiziba ko, gumazamizir arɨmariabagh amima da ghuamaziba ko, gumazamizir igharaz darazir akurvaziba ko, siosɨn ingangaribar amuasa gumazamizibav gɨa ingangariba vaghvagh me ganɨdiba ko, Godɨn Duamɨn otivaghirir mɨzebav geir gumazamizibav sefe.
